summary: Syntax file for Altera Quartus qsf files
name: altera.vim
description: This is a syntax file for Altera Quartus (version .9.1) qsf files.  A dictionary file is included and will automatically link in if found to provide command completion.
install_details: Nothing special.  Just download and unzip/untar.  There's a README file that shows various ways of hooking it in.
